extendedInfo.description: Life RecorderYesterday is history, tomorrow is mystery and today is a gift!It seems that people should focus on the moment, catch it and try all one's efforts to live it meaningfully. There is no use to care about so much of yesterday and tomorrow, which is a passive attitude of life. Do you agree with that? Do you like to recall the yesterday memory and look forward to the future? Many people can not agree. To look back to the past and forward to the future is some kind of human nature. We have it since the moment we came to this world. No one can change and limit it. In fact, it can help one to cherish today much more. In other words, it will be a great part of our life. However, we should first record it before we can recall and look forward. How? Is there a way that give us a favor?Of course, here it is. Its name is Life Recorder, which is free for all the users.Its main functions and advantages:1. Clear user interface gives you wonderful user experience. Facing it, you will not have the feeling against it. Instead, it will please you for your first look.2. Six buttons with different functions: Daily, Add Type, Add Feeling, Add Daily, Password and Supply. Daily is the basic function of the app. It can browse, add and review your Diary. What you have to do is just to follow the steps, which is easy. Add type: you can select a type for your diary, which can make your diary organized. Add Feeling and Add Daily is for you to record what is in your mind and you want to share with yourself.3. Security and protection system. This app is set with password. With "Password Button", you can set and reset your password for launching this app. There is no access for others to read your life records. At the same time, you can achieve the sense of security.4. To meet your need is our greatest pursuit. And also you can have your right to give a comment on our service. Tell us and we will be appreciate very much.Life is short and never comes again. To live your life to the fullest, and try to record every bit of your life. Then one day when you are not today's yourself, you can have something to help your remind the process of your growth and experience. Try this Life Recorder, to record your life from now.The recorder had been revived in the 20th century, which is not only in the pursuit of historically informed performance of early music, but also because of its suitability as a  rather simple instrument for teaching music and its appeal to  some amateur players. Nowadays, it is often thought of as a child's instrument, but there are many professional players who demonstrate the instrument's full solo range. The sound of the recorder is  extraordinarily clear and sweet, partly because of lack of upper harmonics and predominance of odd harmonics in the sound.-----------More info------------I hope you like this app, or like this version, it's my happy~~~ This app is free free free! No memony needed! I just hope you can enjoy it! This app includes some ads, such as icon ad, notification ad, or some other different ads. If you don't like them, you can just uninstall this app, and say goodbye to me~~~~><--------------------------------
